name: Find Yourself (pauty)
description:
F I N D   Y O U R S E L F

You have 1 minute to find the only one that is following all of your commands.

 Controls:

Left click  - Select a character

Right click - Highlight a character

Q - Stop

W - Hi!

E - Jump

R - Dance

Esc - Pause

Game made by Daniele Pautasso and Leonardo Tacconella for the GMTK GameJam 2019
